i1.name: Harrier
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''{{ci|Valor}}''' marks enemies hit by {{ai|Blinding Assault|Quinn}}, {{ai|Skystrike|Quinn}} or targeted by {{ai|Vault|Quinn}} as {{as|Vulnerable|gold}}, {{tip|sight|revealing}} them for 4 seconds. If no {{as|Vulnerable|gold}} target exists for 1 second, '''{{ci|Valor}}''' automatically marks a nearby visible enemy, but is not able to do so again for {{pp|type=critical strike chance|color=critical chance|8*(0.99^((x-1)*10))|key1=%|0 to 100 by 10|formula=8*(0.99^critical strike chance %)}} seconds after the mark has timed out, was consumed or was overwritten by another mark.

'''Quinn's''' next [[basic attack]] {{tip|on-hit}} against a {{as|Vulnerable|gold}} target consumes the mark to deal {{pp|10 to 95|color=physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|16 to 50}} AD)}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
While {{ai|Behind Enemy Lines|Quinn}} is active, ''Harrier'' is disabled and all {{as|Vulnerable|gold}} marks are removed.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Valor marks enemies hit by Blinding Assault, Skystrike or targeted by Vault as Vulnerable, revealing them for 4 seconds. If no Vulnerable target exists for 1 second, Valor automatically marks a nearby visible enemy, but is not able to do so again for 0 to 100 by 10 ‒ undefined seconds after the mark has timed out, was consumed or was overwritten by another mark.
Quinn's next basic attack on-hit against a Vulnerable target consumes the mark to deal 10undefined − 95undefined (based on level) (+ 16% − 50% (based on level) AD) bonus physical damage.
While Behind Enemy Lines is active, Harrier is disabled and all Vulnerable marks are removed.
i1.notes:
* If a mark applied by an ability is overwritten, consumed, or timed out, ''Harrier'' goes on a 1-second cooldown if it's not already on cooldown.
* ''Harrier's'' targeting priority:
*# Last unit hit (if it was a small minion it appears to select a different target).
*# Lowest-health enemy champion.
*# Lowest-health enemy minion.
* ''Harrier'' is consumed even if it is parried, the attack is negated in any case.
* ''Harrier'' will not mark enemy {{tip|minions}} while '''Quinn''' is not {{tip|sight|visible}}, but will mark enemy {{tip|champions}}.

q1.name: Blinding Assault
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Quinn''' signals '''{{ci|Valor}}''' to fly forward in a line in the target direction, stopping upon colliding with an enemy unit, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to them and all nearby enemies and applying {{tip|nearsight}} to the primary target for {{fd|1.75}} seconds.
Non-[[champion]] primary targets are {{tip|disarm|disarmed}} instead for the same duration.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Quinn signals Valor to fly forward in a line in the target direction, stopping upon colliding with an enemy unit, dealing physical damage to them and all nearby enemies and applying nearsight to the primary target for 1.75 seconds.
Non-champion primary targets are disarmed instead for the same duration.
q1.notes:
* ''Blinding Assault's'' {{tip|nearsight}} will persist through {{tip|death}}.
* ''Blinding Assault'' will fire from wherever '''Quinn''' was at the start of the cast time.

effects.str: • Physical Damage: (+ % AD) (+ 50% AP)

w1.name: Heightened Senses
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Quinn''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds whenever she consumes a {{ai|Harrier|Quinn|Vulnerable}} mark.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Quinn''' orders '''{{ci|Valor}}''' to grant {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area for 2 seconds and {{tip|sight|reveal}} enemy champions within for the same duration.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Quinn gains bonus attack speed and bonus movement speed for 2 seconds whenever she consumes a Vulnerable mark.
Active: Quinn orders Valor to grant sight of the surrounding area for 2 seconds and reveal enemy champions within for the same duration.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|20 to 80}}%}}<!--
-->{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|20 to 40}}%}}

effects.str:
• Bonus Attack Speed: %

  • Bonus Movement Speed: %

e1.name: Vault
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Quinn''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy unit, and upon arrival she {{tip|airborne|knocks them back}}, deals them {{as|physical damage}}, and {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 50% which decays over {{fd|1.5}} seconds, after which she immediately {{tip|dash|leaps back}}, landing 525 units away from them.
e1.descriptionHtml: Active: Quinn dashes to the target enemy unit, and upon arrival she knocks them back, deals them physical damage, and slows them by 50% which decays over 1.5 seconds, after which she immediately leaps back, landing 525 units away from them.
e1.notes:
* '''Quinn''' will track the target if they change locations.
** She will dash to the target's previous location without applying ''Vault's'' effects if the target is too far away or moves beyond the maximum tracking distance.
* '''Quinn''' will automatically attempt to attack the target once she completes ''Vault''.
* The target will turn to face the opposite direction after being {{tip|airborne|knocked back}}.
* Unlike its constant cast range ''Vault's'' bounce's can vary to allow '''Quinn''' to close or to make a gap between herself and the target (depending on casting position) or even to jump through a wall (if there is enough landing room on the other side).
* ''Vault'' also interrupts basic attacks with {{tip|uncancelable windup|uncancelable windups}}.{{bug|2}}
